elements.name: Check item total cost and tax

steps.name: I am on the home page
I login in with the following details
I add the following items to the basket
I  should see 4 items added to the shopping cart
I click on the shopping cart
I verify that the QTY count for each item should be 1
I remove the following item:
I  should see 3 items added to the shopping cart
I click on the CHECKOUT button
I type "FirstName" for First Name
I type "LastName" for Last Name
I type "EC1A 9JU" for ZIP/Postal Code
I click on the CONTINUE button
Item total will be equal to the total of items on the list
a Tax rate of 8 % is applied to the total

name: Checkout items in the basket
description: Please use home page of https://www.saucedemo.com/
